diergo.spring.legacy

Class LegacySingletonFieldFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • diergo.spring.legacy.CustomizingTypeFilter<Field>
      • diergo.spring.legacy.LegacySingletonFieldFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SmartBeanDefinitionCustomizer, BeanDefinitionCustomizer, TypeFilter

    class LegacySingletonFieldFilter
extends CustomizingTypeFilter<Field>
    A type filter creating bean definitions for fields with a valid bean type.
    See Also:
    MemberPredicates.withBeanType(), LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessorBuilder.SingletonBuilder.fields(Predicate)

      • supports

        public boolean supports(BeanDefinition bd)
        Description copied from interface: SmartBeanDefinitionCustomizer
        Determine whether this customizer actually supports the given bean definition. The customization should only be called when this method returns true before.
        Specified by:
